display_long_description:
# Welcome to the most immersive theme park in free-to-play VR!

Grab your friends and dive into Oktoberfest – the ultimate social VR fun fair packed with wild rides, haunted houses, adorable pets and nonstop fun in a big variety of attractions and games. 

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

👀 **What Everyone’s Loving:**

🎢 Epic Rides – Lift off in the Rotor, get on a Rollercoaster and many other thrilling rides inspired by real attractions. 

🍺 Barrel Hunt – Jump into the brand-new underground brewery for tag-style hunting chaos.

🎮 Challenging Fair Ground Games – Crash into others in Bumper Cars, serve customers in Order Rush and test your music skills in Brass Band Hero.

🎯 Typical theme park booths – Test your aiming skills in Shooting Range, Can Toss or Flying Frogs

💀 Spooky Co-op Fun – Claim the leaderboards by defeating ghostly waves in Haunting Grounds!

🐾 Adopt a Pet – Care for your cute sidekick, train it and make it find precious treasures!

🧍‍♂️ Style Your Avatar – Traditional, cool or wild? Visit Oktoberfest in your personal style!
 
🎉 It’s always festival season at the Oktoberfest!

 👉 Join the party on Discord: bit.ly/OktoberfestVRDiscord

💀 Spooky Co-op Fun – Claim the leaderboards by defeating ghostly waves in Haunting Grounds!
